params.amount: The amount of tokens that have been minted
params.user: The recipient address of the newly minted tokens

params.approvedSource: The address corresponding to the source bridge contract
params.srcChain: The chain for the approved address
The chain whose support is being removed

params.amt: The amount of tokens being bridged
params.nonce: The nonce corresponding to the contract which originated the msg
params.srcChain: The chain from which the message is originating
params.srcSender: The address of the msg.sender on the source chain
params.txnHash: The hash of the payload that has been bridged

params.amounts: The amount of tokens to reach this threshold
params.chain: The chain for which the threshold was set

params.numApprovers: The number of approvers for this transaction
params.thresholdRequirement: The number of approvals needed for this transaction
params.txnHash: The hash of the payload that has been approved

params.approver: The address we would like to add

addChainSupport(string,string).details: srcContractAddress: Is case sensitive and must be the checksum address of the srcBridge contract which is allowed to call into this contract.

params.srcContractAddress: The address of the Ondo Bridge on the source chain

params.txnHash: The keccak256 hash of the payload
The hash to get the number of approvers for

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.approver: The address of the approver that we would like to remove

params.srcChain: The source chain whose support is being removed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._token: The address of the token to rescue

setThresholds(string,uint256[],uint256[].details: This function will remove all previously set thresholds for a given chain      and will thresholds corresponding to the params of this function. Passing      in empty arrays will remove all thresholds for a given chain

params.amounts: The ordered array of values corresponding to                       the amount for a given threshold
params.numOfApprovers: The ordered array of the number of approvals needed                       for a given threshold
params.srcChain: The chain to set the threshold for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ApproverAdded(address).notice: event emitted when an address is added as an approver

ApproverRemoved(address).notice: event emitted when an address is removed as an approver

BridgeCompleted(address,uint256).notice: event emitted when the user has been minted their tokens on the dst chain

ChainIdSupported(string,string).notice: event emitted when a new contract is whitelisted as an approved         message passer.

ChainSupportRemoved(string).notice: event emitted when support for a chain is removed

MessageReceived(bytes32,string,address,u.notice: event emitted when this bridge contract receives a cross chain message

MintLimitDurationSet(uint256).notice: Event emitted when mint limit duration is set

MintLimitSet(uint256).notice: Event emitted when mint limit is set

ThresholdSet(string,uint256[],uint256[]).notice: event emitted when a threshold has been set

TransactionApproved(bytes32,address,uint.notice: event emitted when a transaction has been approved

TOKEN().notice: Token contract bridged by this contract

VERSION().notice: Versioning for payload, must match SourceBridge version

addApprover(address).notice: Admin function to add an ondo Signer or Axelar Relayer

addChainSupport(string,string).notice: Admin function that will allow bridge calls originating from a given address         on a given chain.This will initialize a nested mapping in which spent nonces from this `srcAddress`         are logged and prevented from being reused

approve(bytes32).notice: Protected Function used to approve messages passed to the         Receiver contract. This function is able to be called by any         approver that is added and associated with Ondo.

getNumApproved(bytes32).notice: External view function used to get the number of approvers for a         given txnHash

pause().notice: Admin function used to pause the contract

removeApprover(address).notice: Admin function to remove an approver

removeChainSupport(string).notice: Admin function that will remove support for previously supported chains

rescueTokens(address).notice: Admin function used to rescue ERC20 Tokens sent to the contract

setMintLimit(uint256).notice: Admin function used to set the mint limit

setMintLimitDuration(uint256).notice: Admin function used to set the mint duration

setThresholds(string,uint256[],uint256[].notice: Admin function used to clear and set thresholds corresponding to a chain

txnToThresholdSet(bytes32).notice: Mappings used to track transaction and thresholds

unpause().notice: Admin function used to unpause the contract
